pr_title: SONARJAVA-3373 Rule S5810: JUnit5 test classes and methods should not have private visibility

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3373 Rule S5810: JUnit5 test classes and methods should not have private visibility

timeline.bodyText: Do we have some standardized way of constructing strings? I've previously seen a lot of String.format as well - is that choice up to personal preference?
timeline.author: johann-beleites-sonarsource

replies.bodyText: I didn't see any standard between + and String.format in our checks. A quick grep report 170 reportIssue with a + and 105 String.format. Personally, I use String.format when I want to share the message at several locations or because I want a specific format like %04X.
replies.author: alban-auzeill
